channel.title: Empire's Mod
channel.description:
Anyone here happen to play this? I'm one hell of a commander, and one bomb-ass engi.
The community isn't so large anymore...
For those who don't know, it's a RTS/FPS combo, with quite a bit of strategy involved. I'm no Marketing guy, but it's damn fun. If you haven't heard of it, or played it, here's the linkie; [url]https://www.empiresmod.com/[/url]
It's a jolly good time with a buncha friends. If any of you feel like learning a bit, I'm almost always available, so hit me up. Friend ID is Bamm750
My game-name is the same as my name here. Cheers.

item.title: Empire's Mod
item.dc:creator: Solokiller
item.description:
It’s Empires mod, not Empire’s mod, just saying.

Read full topic
